analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la yang dag par snang ba ltar /
translated: and in the family of the bodhisattvas,🔽you do not appear in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas and in the family of the bodhisattvas.’

original: khyod ni / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la yang dag par mi snang ngo; ;zhes de des byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la brnyas shing smod par byed na /
analyzed: khyod ni / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la yang dag par mi snang ngo; ;zhes de des byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la brnyas shing smod par byed na /
translated: “When they disparage and insult those individuals who are in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,

original: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du /
analyzed: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du /
translated: Māra, the evil one, thinks,

original: bdag gi gnas kyang stongs par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: bdag gi gnas kyang stongs par mi 'gyur la /
translated: ‘My abode will not be emptied

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul dag kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul dag kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the great hells, the animal realms, the worlds of Yama, and the worlds of hungry ghosts will increase greatly.

original: snyam du sems shing /
analyzed: snyam du sems shing /
translated: Thinking in this way,

original: bdud sdig can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byin gyis rlob par byed do //
analyzed: bdud sdig can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byin gyis rlob par byed do //
translated: the evil Māra will bless the bodhisattva so that his words will be accepted.

original: de'i tshig gzung bar 'os pa de la 'gro ba mang po dag kyang mnyan par bya bar sems te /
analyzed: de'i tshig gzung bar 'os pa de la 'gro ba mang po dag kyang mnyan par bya bar sems te /
translated: Many people will think that the bodhisattva’s words are worth listening to.

original: de dag gis de la mnyan cing dad par bya bar bsam pas de dag gis mthong ba na mthun par byed de /
analyzed: de dag gis de la mnyan cing dad par bya bar bsam pas de dag gis mthong ba na mthun par byed de /
translated: They will listen to him and think of having faith in him. When they see him, they will agree with him.

original: de dag gis de mthong nas rjes su mthun par spyod cing de dag de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gis de mthong nas rjes su mthun par spyod cing de dag de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur ro //
translated: When they see him, they will practice in accordance with him and they will train in that way.

original: de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas /
translated: Training in that way and practicing in that way,

original: nyon mongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: their reactive emotions will increase.

original: de ltar de dag sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad kyang mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar de dag sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad kyang mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Whatever actions of body, speech, and mind they undertake, all of that will be unwholesome, ugly, and unpleasant.

original: de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang 'phel @367b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang 'phel @367b par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the great hells will increase.

original: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The animal realms, the world of Yama, and the world of hungry ghosts will also increase.

original: bdud kyi gnas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdud kyi gnas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: The realm of Māra will also increase.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: don gyi dbang de mthong bas na /
analyzed: don gyi dbang de mthong bas na /
translated: seeing this power of the matter,

original: bdud sdig can yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud sdig can yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the evil Māra will be delighted, very happy, joyful, and content.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang lhan cig rtsod par byed na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dang lhan cig rtsod par byed na /
translated: if a person who is a follower of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas argues with a person who is a follower of the vehicle of the hearers,

original: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du /
analyzed: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du /
translated: Then the evil Māra thinks this:

original: aa la la rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni /
analyzed: aa la la rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni /
translated: ‘Ha! These sons of good family

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa yin te /
translated: are making the knowledge of all aspects distant.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: They are

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: not approaching the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa 'di ni /
translated: This quarreling, this fault-finding, this fighting, this arguing,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin gyi /
translated: is not the path to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ni / sems can dmyal ba'i lam yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni / sems can dmyal ba'i lam yin la /
translated: This is the path to the hells,

original: 'di ni / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam yin te /
translated: this is the path to the animal world, this is the path to the world of Yama,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the path to the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: snyam mo // kun dga' bo /
analyzed: snyam mo // kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan dang 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dag byed par gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan dang 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dag byed par gyur na /
translated: Moreover, if a person belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle should fight, quarrel, argue, and dispute with another person belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle,

original: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du /🔽'di gnyis ni /
analyzed: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du / 'di gnyis ni /
translated: then Mara, the Evil One, will think,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed @368a *//🔽pa yin te /🔽'di gnyis kyis ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed @368a *// pa yin te / 'di gnyis kyis ni /
translated: “These two are far from the knowledge of all modes.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: These two will not fully know the supreme enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni /
translated: And why?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te /
translated: Because these two sons of good family are not on the way to the knowledge of all modes.

original: gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gang rigs kyi bu 'di dag rtsom pa 'di ni /
translated: These two sons of good family are not on the way to the supreme enlightenment.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i lam dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i lam dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the path to the hells, the animal world, and the world of Yama.

original: snyam mo // kun dga' bo /
analyzed: snyam mo // kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa zhig lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems kyi sems skyed par byed cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa zhig lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems kyi sems skyed par byed cing /
translated: if a bodhisattva who has not received a prophecy should arouse thoughts of ill will toward a bodhisattva who has received a prophecy,

original: 'thab mo dang / 'khrug long dang / mtshang 'dru dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed la /
analyzed: 'thab mo dang / 'khrug long dang / mtshang 'dru dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par byed la /
translated: and should quarrel with, dispute with, find fault with, and argue with that bodhisattva,

original: gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma btang na /
analyzed: gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma btang na /
translated: but if he does not give up the knowledge of all aspects,

original: des ji snyed du 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa de snyed kyi bskal par des go cha bgo bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: des ji snyed du 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa de snyed kyi bskal par des go cha bgo bar bya dgos so //
translated: then for as many eons as he has aroused thoughts of quarreling, finding fault, arguing, and disputing, for that many eons he will have to don the armor.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Ānanda said to him,🔽“Lord, if a bodhisattva great being who has not received a prophecy should quarrel with, dispute with, find fault with, and argue with a bodhisattva great being who has received a prophecy, how much negative karma does he create?”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sems bskyed pa de dag la nges par 'byung ba mchis sam /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de dag la nges par 'byung ba mchis sam /
translated: are these aspirations for awakening definite or not?

original: 'on te de snyed kyi bskal ba kho nar go cha bgo bar bgyi 'tshal lags /
analyzed: 'on te de snyed kyi bskal ba kho nar go cha bgo bar bgyi 'tshal lags /
translated: Or should I don the armor for that many eons?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces dka' stsal to //🔽kun dga' bo //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces dka' stsal to // kun dga' bo //
translated: When he had thus requested, the Blessed One said to the venerable Ānanda,

original: @368b ngas ni /
analyzed: @368b ngas ni /
translated: “Ānanda,🔽I have taught the Dharma with definite deliverance

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
translated: to those who follow the vehicle of the hearers, those who follow the vehicle of the solitary buddhas, and those who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khro ba dang / spyo bar byed cing 'thab cing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang chags par mi byed par mdud par 'dzin cing /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khro ba dang / spyo bar byed cing 'thab cing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang chags par mi byed par mdud par 'dzin cing /
translated: In this regard, when a person who is a bodhisattva-yāna practitioner quarrels, disputes, is angry, and scolds a person who is a bodhisattva-yāna practitioner, having quarreled, disputed, been angry, and scolded, they do not become attached, but hold grudges.

original: bag la nyal bas gnas par byed na /
analyzed: bag la nyal bas gnas par byed na /
translated: If a person belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle should quarrel, dispute, be angry, and revile a person belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle, and, having quarrelled, disputed, been angry, and reviled, should not let go of his anger, but should persist in his anger,

original: kun dga' bo /🔽gang zag de la ni /
analyzed: kun dga' bo / gang zag de la ni /
translated: Ānanda,🔽I do not say that such a person

original: nges par 'byung ba yod par nga mi smra ste /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba yod par nga mi smra ste /
translated: will certainly go forth.

original: gang zag des ni /
analyzed: gang zag des ni /
translated: If that person

original: gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtong na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtong na /
translated: does not give up the knowledge of all aspects,

original: de snyed kyi bskal par gdon mi za bar go cha bgo bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: de snyed kyi bskal par gdon mi za bar go cha bgo bar bya dgos so //
translated: he will certainly have to don the armor for that many eons.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'thab cing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang 'chags par byed cing bag la nyal bas mi gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'thab cing rtsod la khros shing spyos nas kyang 'chags par byed cing bag la nyal bas mi gnas te /
translated: further, if a bodhisattva great being, having quarrelled, disputed, been angry, and reviled, should confess, and should not persist in his anger,

original: bdag gis ni /
analyzed: bdag gis ni /
translated: but should think,

original: thob par bya ba nges par thob ste /
analyzed: thob par bya ba nges par thob ste /
translated: I will certainly obtain what I have to obtain.

original: bdag gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na /
analyzed: bdag gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na /
translated: I must remove the suffering of all sentient beings.

original: smras pa la bdag gis phyir smra ba dang / 'di ltar /
analyzed: smras pa la bdag gis phyir smra ba dang / 'di ltar /
translated: If someone were to speak unpleasantly to me, I would reply to him.

original: bdag sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na /🔽bdag gzhan la mi snyan bar smra zhing phyir zlog pa ni /
analyzed: bdag sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na / bdag gzhan la mi snyan bar smra zhing phyir zlog pa ni /
translated: If I must become a bridge for all sentient beings,

original: mi tshul gyi /
analyzed: mi tshul gyi /
translated: it would be inappropriate for me to speak unpleasantly to others and to turn them away.

original: bdag gis de ltar mi bya bar bdag lug ltar lkug par bya zhing mi smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de ltar mi bya bar bdag lug ltar lkug par bya zhing mi smra bar bya'o //
translated: I should not do that. I should be like a sheep, mute and speechless.

original: bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dkrug par mi bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dkrug par mi bya ste /
translated: I should not disturb my superior attitude.

original: @369a *// bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na /
analyzed: @369a *// bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na /
translated: When I have fully awakened to highest genuine full Awakening, I must lead these very sentient beings to complete Nirvaṇa.

original: de dag nyid la bdag gnod sems bskyed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug par byed pa ni /🔽mi tshul gyi /
analyzed: de dag nyid la bdag gnod sems bskyed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug par byed pa ni /🔽mi tshul gyi /
translated: It would be inappropriate for me to arouse malice toward them and to quarrel with them.

original: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems mi skyed cing /
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems mi skyed cing /
translated: I will not give rise to ill will toward them.

original: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o //
translated: I will not be angry with them.

original: zhes phyin chad kyang sdom pa 'dzin par byed na /
analyzed: zhes phyin chad kyang sdom pa 'dzin par byed na /
translated: ” In this way, they will also take up the precepts.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: I say that bodhisattva great beings

original: nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin no //🔽zhes nga smra ste /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin no // zhes nga smra ste /
translated: are those who have renunciation.

original: de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Māra the evil one will not find an opportunity to harm them.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: furthermore, bodhisattva great beings should not live together with people who follow the Hearers’ Vehicle.

original: gal te gnas na'ang gang la'ang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gal te gnas na'ang gang la'ang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: If they do live together, they should not give rise to ill will toward anyone.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar / gang gi phyir 'di dag la gnod sems bskyed pa'am /🔽'khrug par bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar / gang gi phyir 'di dag la gnod sems bskyed pa'am / 'khrug par bya ba ni /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because it is not right for me to give rise to ill will

original: bdag la rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag la rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or to be angry with them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di dag ni /
translated: In this way,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: they should be liberated from all suffering after fully awakening to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: snyam mo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: snyam mo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: ” Then the venerable Ānanda said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' @369b sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du ji ltar gnas par bgyi lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' @369b sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du ji ltar gnas par bgyi lags /
translated: how should bodhisattva great beings conduct themselves in the presence of those who follow the Bodhisattva Vehicle?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One replied,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ston pa la ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ston pa la ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi drung du gnas par bya'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings should conduct themselves in the presence of those who follow the Bodhisattva Vehicle just as they would in the presence of the Teacher.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ni / bdag gi grogs yin te; theg pa gcig la zhugs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ni / bdag gi grogs yin te; theg pa gcig la zhugs pa yin zhing /
translated: This is my companion, who is engaged in the same vehicle as I am.

original: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de ltar bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos la /
analyzed: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de ltar bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos la /
translated: I should train in the way that he trains.

original: 'dis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: I should train in the perfection of giving, up to the knowledge of all aspects, in which he trains.

original: gal te 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas 'dres par gnas na /
analyzed: gal te 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang bral bas 'dres par gnas na /
translated: If he is staying in a mixed situation, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag gis de la bslab par mi bya'i //
analyzed: bdag gis de la bslab par mi bya'i //
translated: I should not train with him.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas na /
translated: But if this bodhisattva great being is staying without being separated from attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag gis kyang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o //
translated: I should stay like that too.

original: snyam ste / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: snyam ste / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Thinking like this, a bodhisattva great being

original: bslab pa mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: bslab pa mnyam pa yin no //
translated: is equal in his training.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /🔽bslab pa mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las / bslab pa mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines,

original: lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o ////
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o ////
translated: this is the chapter called “Equal Training.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor @370a *//🔽gyis 'di skad ces gsol to /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor @370a *// gyis 'di skad ces gsol to /
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags /
translated: what is the equality of the bodhisattva great beings, in which bodhisattva great beings should train?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni /
translated: “Su­bhūti, it is the emptiness of internal phenomena, and in the same vein, it is the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin no //
translated: is the sameness of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: gzugs ni / gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs ni / gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Form, Subhūti, is empty of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness

original: rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: are empty of consciousness.

original: de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang byang chub kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub kyi bar du'ang byang chub kyis stong ste /
translated: Similarly, up to awakening is empty of awakening.

original: rab 'byor / de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni /
translated: Subhūti,🔽that is the sameness

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin te /
translated: of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: mnyam pa nyid de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Abiding in that sameness, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ci / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: ci / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
translated: if bodhisattva mahāsattvas train in order to exhaust form,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: Are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na /
translated: If they train in order to free form from attachment,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'gog pa'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: gzugs 'gog pa'i slad du slob na /
translated: If they train in order to stop form,

original: rnam pa @370b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa @370b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du slob na /
analyzed: gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du slob na /
translated: If they train in order that form not arise,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dag bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na /
analyzed: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dag bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na /
translated: Similarly, if they train in order to perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na /
analyzed: de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na /
translated: Similarly, if they train in order that the four detailed and thorough knowledges not arise,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i bar du slob na /
translated: and similarly, up to and including consciousness,🔽train in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽And similarly, up to and including nonproduction,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam; skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar gyi slad du slob na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam; skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar gyi slad du slob na /
translated: train in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽And similarly, up to and including awakening,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: byang chub kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i bar du slob na /
translated: And similarly, up to and including separation from desire, cessation, and nonproduction,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: train in the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: de bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o //
translated: And similarly, apply this extensively to all of them.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Venerable Subhūti having said that, the Lord said to him,

original: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod 'di skad du /
translated: “Subhūti, you have said,

original: gang gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na /
analyzed: gang gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na /
translated: ‘Those who train in order to cause form to be extinguished

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
translated: Are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: skye ba med pa'i bar du slob na /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i bar du slob na /
translated: If they train in non-production,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na /
translated: If they train in the exhaustion of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: @371a *// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: @371a *// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na /
translated: If they train in non-production,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: byang chub kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir slob na /
translated: If they train in the exhaustion, dispassion, cessation, and non-production of awakening,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: de bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //🔽zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o // zhes zer ba ni /
translated: And so on extensively for all.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin no //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhuti : Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being,🔽

original: bdud dam / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thul bar mi nus pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

original: myur ba nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

original: rang gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rang gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin no // rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

original: mun pa med par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: mun pa med par byed pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa yin no // rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

translated: Why is that?🔽Because they have the skillful means by which bodhisattva great beings, while resting in the concentrations, resting in the immeasurables, and resting in the formless absorptions, do not take rebirth under the influence of the concentrations,

translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that🔽will not be reborn among the long-lived gods.

translated: and the purity of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, he will realize the purity of the power of all the buddhadharmas.”

translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

analyzed: gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin te; de de bzhin no //

analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni /

original: rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na /

analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong nas /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: In the regions of the great earth, where there are gold nuggets and silver of the Jambū River,🔽they are few.

original: nyung ngo // rab 'byor /
analyzed: nyung ngo // rab 'byor /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni / nyung gi / sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: who train in this training in the perfection of wisdom🔽are few.🔽Those sentient beings who abide in the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa de dag ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa de dag ni /
translated: or the level of the pratyekabuddhas

analyzed: de bas ches mang ngo //
translated: are much more numerous.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

analyzed: dper na / sems can gang dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni /
translated: For example, those sentient beings who have taken up and abide in the karma that will become a universal monarch

original: nyung gi / sems can gang dag khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni /
analyzed: nyung gi / sems can gang dag khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ni /

original: ches mang ngo //
analyzed: ches mang ngo //
translated: Those who have taken up the karma that will lead to their becoming a king of a small country are far more numerous.

analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni / nyung gi / sems can gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni /
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, those sentient beings who have set out on this path to complete knowing are few.

original: ches mang ngo //
analyzed: ches mang ngo //
translated: Those sentient beings who have set out on the path of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas are far more numerous.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de bzhin nyid la sgrub pa dag ches nyung ngo
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de bzhin nyid la sgrub pa dag ches nyung ngo
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are fewer still than those bodhisattva great beings who practice suchness.

analyzed: // de bas kyang gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: Those who will abide in the state of a śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha are far more numerous.

original: ches mang ngo //
analyzed: ches mang ngo //
translated: It is much more.🔽

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog @374a *//🔽pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de dag pas ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog @374a *// pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de dag pas ni /

translated: than those who will not reach the irreversible level.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na /
translated: “Subhūti, therefore

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar bgrang bar chud par 'dod pas /
translated: bodhisattva great beings who want to reach the irreversible level and want to be counted among those on the irreversible level

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: do not produce a thought associated with stinginess.

original: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //🔽'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do // 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

original: le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

original: rnam par g-yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

analyzed: 'chal pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

original: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

analyzed: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do // gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

original: tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: He does not arouse a thought associated with pride.

original: gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: He does not arouse a thought associated with feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
translated: In the same way, he does not arouse a thought associated with , up to and including enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni /

analyzed: @374b chos gang yang mi dmigs te /

original: mi dmigs pas /
analyzed: mi dmigs pas /

analyzed: chos gang la'ang sems bskyed par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yang dag par bzung ba yin no //

translated: if you want to speak the Buddha’s Dharma and increase the talk of Dharma,

original: pa zab mo 'di nyid la de ltar bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: pa zab mo 'di nyid la de ltar bslab par bya'o //
translated: you should train in just this perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni; phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi 'thob pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni; phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi 'thob pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, there is nothing that a bodhisattva great being training in the perfection of wisdom does not attain among the perfections to be attained.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ci / nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam /
analyzed: ci / nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam /
translated: does that also attain the perfection of the śrāvakas?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi lags sam /
translated: will they also attain the perfection of a pratyekabuddha?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya zhing rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya mod kyi /
analyzed: rab 'byor / nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya zhing rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bya mod kyi /
translated: “Subhūti, they will attain the perfection of a śrāvaka and they will attain the perfection of a pratyekabuddha,🔽but they should not remain there,

original: de la gnas par mi bya /
analyzed: de la gnas par mi bya /
translated: they should not rely on it.🔽Having seen it with knowledge and vision, they should go beyond it🔽and enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who train like that🔽have approached the knowledge of all aspects🔽and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”🔽“Blessed One, how do bodhisattva great beings🔽who have set out in the Great Vehicle🔽train in the perfection of wisdom?”🔽The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings🔽who have set out in the Great Vehicle🔽train in the perfection of wisdom🔽by not training in any dharma at all.”🔽“Blessed One, how do bodhisattva great beings🔽who have set out in the Great Vehicle🔽train in the perfection of wisdom🔽by not training in any dharma at all?”

original: brten par mi bya ste /
analyzed: brten par mi bya ste /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings🔽who have set out in the Great Vehicle🔽train in the perfection of wisdom🔽by not training in form,🔽not training in feeling,🔽not training in perception,🔽not training in volitional factors,🔽and not training in consciousness.🔽They train in the perfection of wisdom

original: shes pa dang mthong bas rnam par bltas nas shin tu 'da' bar bya ste /
analyzed: shes pa dang mthong bas rnam par bltas nas shin tu 'da' bar bya ste /
translated: by not training in the eyes,🔽not training in the ears,🔽not training in the nose,🔽not training in the tongue,🔽not training in the body,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: and not training in the mind.🔽They train in the perfection of wisdom🔽by not training in sights,🔽not training in sounds,🔽not training in smells,🔽not training in tastes,

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: not training in tangibles,🔽and not training in mental phenomena.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te /
translated: They train in the perfection of wisdom🔽by not training in the sensory element of the eyes,🔽not training in the sensory element of sights,🔽not training in the sensory element of visual consciousness,🔽and not training in the sensory element of contact associated with the eyes.🔽They train in the perfection of wisdom🔽by not training in the sensory element of the ears,🔽not training in the sensory element of sounds,🔽not training in the sensory element of auditory consciousness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: and not training

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains in that way

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te /

original: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

original: gang @376b dag de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: gang @376b dag de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: surpasses all those who are recipients of gifts, such as the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and comes closer to omniscience.

original: rab 'byor; de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor; de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Su­bhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains in that way

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no //

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /

translated: He will keep far away from the śrāvaka level and the pratyekabuddha level,🔽and will approach unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽If he thinks,🔽‘This is the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin no //

translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being who practices like that

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /🔽spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las / spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines,

original: lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: the chapter called “Practice” is the fifty-seventh.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, thought this:

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Here bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of generosity, perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom are not joined with skillful means.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pas kyang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pas kyang /
translated: They practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, and in the same vein, they practice the , up to and including the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad zil gyis non par 'gyur na /
analyzed: sems can thams cad zil gyis non par 'gyur na /
translated: “They will surpass all sentient beings by practicing the perfection of wisdom, and similarly, connect this with each, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: So what need is there to speak of those who fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: @377b sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed cing /
analyzed: @377b sems can gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed cing /
translated: Those sentient beings who turn their minds to the knowledge of all aspects have gained a good gain,

original: 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na /
analyzed: 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na /
translated: and they live a good life.

original: gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: So what need is there to speak of those who produce the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni /
analyzed: sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni /
translated: Those sentient beings who produce the thought of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: 'dod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod par bya ba yin no //
translated: are worthy of being desired.

original: sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Those beings who have generated the mind of unsurpassed, complete enlightenment are also to be desired.

original: snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog mand'a ra ba dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / me tog mand'a ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to //
analyzed: snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog mand'a ra ba dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / me tog mand'a ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to //
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, took mandāra flowers and went to where the Blessed One was. Having arrived, he scattered those mandāra flowers over the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One.🔽He scattered them,

original: mngon par gtor to; ;mngon par rab tu gtor to //🔽gtor / mngon par gtor /
analyzed: mngon par gtor to; ;mngon par rab tu gtor to // gtor / mngon par gtor /
translated: he scattered them again and again,

original: mngon par rab tu gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: mngon par rab tu gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: and having scattered them, he said these words:🔽Blessed One, those beings who have generated the mind of unsurpassed, complete enlightenment are to be desired.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dmigs pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dmigs pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: By this root of virtue, may those persons who are in the Bodhisattva Vehicle and are intent on supreme, perfect enlightenment perfect the qualities of the Buddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they perfect the qualities of the knowledge of all modes.

original: rang byung gi chos 'di dag nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: rang byung gi chos 'di dag nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they perfect these self-originated qualities.

original: 'dis zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'dis zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they perfect the uncontaminated qualities.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag ni / @378a *//
analyzed: bdag ni / @378a *//
translated: I am

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa /
translated: those persons who are in the Bodhisattva Vehicle and are intent on supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog par 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: bla na med pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog par 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis lags so //
translated: I do not have even the slightest thought that would turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub las slar ldog cing /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag byang chub las slar ldog cing /
translated: Blessed One,🔽I do not have even the slightest thought that would turn away from awakening,

original: nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis te /
analyzed: nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems skye ba 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis te /
translated: and that would make me a śrāvaka or a pratyekabuddha.

original: gzhan du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni /🔽de ltar 'khor ba na rgyu ba'i sdug bsngal 'di dag mthong nas 'di ltar sems bskyed par bgyid de /
analyzed: gzhan du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni / de ltar 'khor ba na rgyu ba'i sdug bsngal 'di dag mthong nas 'di ltar sems bskyed par bgyid de /
translated: Other than that, bodhisattvas who seek the welfare and healing and happiness of the world with its gods, humans, and asuras

original: bdag brgal nas ma brgal ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar bsgral bar bgyi /
analyzed: bdag brgal nas ma brgal ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar bsgral bar bgyi /
translated: see these sufferings of those wandering in saṃsāra and think, ‘Having crossed over, I will liberate those beings who have not crossed over.

original: bdag grol nas ma grol ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar dgrol bar bgyi /
analyzed: bdag grol nas ma grol ba'i sems can rnams ji ltar dgrol bar bgyi /
translated: Having been liberated, how should I liberate those sentient beings who are not liberated?

original: bdag dbugs phyin nas dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi /🔽bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed par bgyid cing /
analyzed: bdag dbugs phyin nas dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi / bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed par bgyid cing /
translated: Having been comforted, how should I comfort those sentient beings who are not comforted?🔽Having attained complete nirvāṇa, how should I lead to complete nirvāṇa those sentient beings who have not attained complete nirvāṇa?’

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam rgya chen po dag kyang 'debs par bgyid lags so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam rgya chen po dag kyang 'debs par bgyid lags so //
translated: They generate the intention for unsurpassed, complete, and perfect awakening and make vast aspirations for unsurpassed, complete, and perfect awakening.”

original: bcom @378b ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom @378b ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: son of noble family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring du spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring du spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang /
translated: “Son of noble family, how much merit will a son or daughter of noble family generate by rejoicing in the development of the mind of the bodhisattvas who are beginners in the vehicle, and by rejoicing in the development of the mind of the bodhisattvas who have practiced for a long time,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags /
translated: and by rejoicing in the development of the mind of the bodhisattvas who are irreversible, and by rejoicing in the development of the mind of the bodhisattvas who are impeded by only one birth?”🔽Śakra, the lord of the gods, replied, “Blessed One, it is a great deal.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Kauśika, a son or daughter of noble family who makes offerings to all the beings in all the world systems in the great trichiliocosm, as many as there are, with all forms of honor,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
analyzed: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
translated: it is possible that the world systems of the great trichiliocosm

original: srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi /
translated: could be measured by weighing them on a scale,

original: rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni /

original: de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin no //
translated: cannot be measured.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
translated: it is possible that the world systems of the great trichiliocosm

original: srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi /
analyzed: srang la gzhal bas tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi /
translated: could be measured by weighing them on a scale,

original: rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni /
translated: but the merit from those instances of generating the mind of awakening that arise from rejoicing

original: de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin no //
translated: cannot be measured.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po dag ni /🔽skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i @379a *//
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po dag ni / skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i @379a *//
translated: it is possible that the great oceans in the world systems of the great trichiliocosm🔽could be measured by taking up with the tip of a strand of hair split a hundred ways each drop

analyzed: thigs pa re re nas bcu zhing tshad gzung du rung yang srid kyi /
translated: of water that has been taken out,🔽but

analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshad ni /
translated: The merit of the generation of the thought of enlightenment which arises from the rejoicing in those is not like that.

original: de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin no //
translated: It is not so.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this had been said, Śatakratu, head of the gods, said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

analyzed: sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /

translated: are on the side of the Evil One.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni /
translated: those beings who do not rejoice in those thoughts of enlightenment

original: bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa lags so //
analyzed: bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa lags so //

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: sems can gang dag sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba mngon par sgrub cing /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyid pa de dag ni /
